subject: Sailboats and Sailing
Rescues
lead_paragraph: The former chairman and chief executive officer of United Technologies, George David, was among 21 crew members who were rescued after their yacht capsized in a race off the coast of Ireland, racing officials said.
snippet: The former chairman and chief executive officer of United Technologies, George David, was among 21 crew members who were rescued after their yacht capsized in a race off the coast of Ireland, racing officials said.
